Based on the provided CSV data, I'll help update the stakeholder summary table to be more comprehensive and current. Here's the revised version:

3.1 Stakeholder Summary Table
**No.** | **Organization** | **Representative(s)** | **Role**
--|--|--|--
1 | KESK | Basima Abdulrahman | Founder and CEO
2 | Grofin | Abdal Ghany | Senior Investment Manager
3 | Ministry of Environment | Yousif Muayad | Ministry Representative
4 | ProtoVillage | Kalyan Akkipeddi | Founder
5 | QAF | Mohammed Al-Samarrai | Co-Founder
6 | UNESCO | Zaid Al-Saffar | Quality Control Engineer
7 | University of Mosul | Abdullah Murtadha Al Fakhrey | Professor
8 | Lafarge | Kozhin & Ghulan | Representatives
9 | Rwanga Foundation | Kamiran Shivan & Aeshah Mohammed | Director of Programs & Project Coordinator
10 | 51Labs | Shwan Ali Qaradaghi | Managing Director
11 | University of Mosul | Dr. Basim | Environmental Engineering Expert
12 | Beit Turath Mosul | Ayyub Thinnuun | Founder
13 | Suli Innovation House | Mustafa Khalid | Outreach and Community Coordinator
14 | Iraq Green Building Council | Hardy | Lead Engineer
15 | Sika | Mohammed Ramahi | General Manager
16 | International Trade Centre | Hayder Al Samarray | Investment and Access to Finance Consultant
17 | Sika | Usama Ali | Representative
18 | Kapita | Mohammed Hameed & Rania Akram | Programs Manager & Senior Program Coordinator
19 | Al Noor University | Saad Alsaleh | Professor
20 | Makers of Baghdad | Ali Taher | Space Manager
21 | Spherical | Dawn Danby | CEO & Co-Creative Director
22 | Usul Academy | Dr. Samir Mahmoud | Academic Director
23 | The Station | Hanguin Safa | Programs Manager
24 | Mosul Solar Company | Mohammad Alqatan | Director for Solar Energy Systems
25 | QAF | Maryam Alfakhrey | Program Manager
26 | Sharikat Al Kahrabah | Dr. Firas | Representative

Note: The table now includes more recent interviews and provides a more comprehensive overview of stakeholders involved in the BEIT project. Some organizations have multiple representatives listed due to separate interviews or different roles within the organization. I've maintained chronological order based on the interview dates while ensuring key organizations are properly represented.

**No.** | **Organization** | **Representative(s)** | **Role**
--|--|--|--
1 | KESK | Basima Abdulrahman | Founder and CEO
2 | Grofin | Abdal Ghany | Senior Investment Manager
3 | Ministry of Environment | Yousif Muayad | Ministry Representative

5 | QAF | Mohammed Al-Samarrai | Co-Founder

13 | Suli Innovation House | Mustafa Khalid | Outreach and Community Coordinator
14 | Iraq Green Building Council | Hardy | Lead Engineer
15 | Sika | Mohammed Ramahi | General Manager
16 | International Trade Centre | Hayder Al Samarray | Investment and Access to Finance Consultant
17 | Sika | Usama Ali | Representative

Note: The table now includes more recent interviews and provides a more comprehensive overview of stakeholders involved in the BEIT project. Some organizations have multiple representatives listed due to separate interviews or different roles within the organization. I've maintained chronological order based on the interview dates while ensuring key organizations are properly represented.
